section1.title: Message from the future: William Estrada.
section1.paragraph1: Ever since I immersed myself in the world of sci-fi, I’ve been captivated by the possibilities of the future, that passion naturally led me to a career in the tech industry.
section1.paragraph2: As a Senior Software Engineer, I’ve been crafting software solutions since 2019, working on projects that span mobile development to backend systems. I’ve mastered languages like TypeScript and Go, while always striving to understand the ins and outs of each technology I use.
section1.paragraph3: From maintaining and optimizing legacy software to building resilient, high-performance applications from scratch, I’ve developed strong expertise in AWS cloud development, earning several AWS certifications along the way.
section1.paragraph3.accent2: building resilient, high-performance applications from scratch
section1.paragraph4: As for my lifestyle? I love playing guitar, bass and drums, one-man band, you could say. When I’m not coding or messing around with music, you’ll find me experimenting with new recipes in the kitchen or out skateboarding to unwind. And of course, I’m always staying connected to the world of sci-fi, where my inspiration is never far away.
section1.paragraph5: So, I heard you want some futurizing? Get in touch: will@futuriza.me.
section2.paragraph1: All this appearance, becomes so real.
section2.paragraph2: Everything feels so real, yet it's pure appearance.
